name: Kimchi Butter
description: A simple compound butter flavored with kimchi. Use it on grilled meat, vegetables, or seafood.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine butter and kimchi in the bowl of a food processor (see note). Pulse until combined. (It may take a few pulses to fully incorporate the kimchi liquid.) Wrap butter tightly and store in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks or in the freezer for several months.
